mapper.select:
select question_resolve_list_id, question_resolve_id, question_resolve_list_desc, question_resolve_list_seqe, remark from sys_question_resolve_list t
where question_resolve_id ='${questionResolveId}'
order by question_resolve_list_seqe asc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_question_resolve_list (question_resolve_list_id, question_resolve_id, question_resolve_list_desc, question_resolve_list_seqe, remark) values ('${questionResolveListId}', '${questionResolveId}', '${questionResolveListDesc}', '${questionResolveListSeqe}', '${remark}')
